documents.document: Cmon Australia, keep #celebtom in there & let the miserable bastard suffer. #ImACelebrityAU
Quite possibly the best set the #GOAT has ever played in a slam? History beckons. #fedfan #ausopen #GoRoger
@seancallanan hardest thing in the game is turning momentum once it's gone. I agree- the #1 value of digital marketing: data & immediacy
@seancallanan it's that classic scenario where you see the event, see the participants & automatically assume sold out isn't it?
Apparently #Raonic has #manflu. He's a better man than me if he even gets out of bed today. #AusOpen
Solid announcement from the #Andrews Gov't but why not deal with the root cause: NO BAIL for violent crimes? #auspol #TodayShow
Split screen. Voice over. Any other stunts to take focus off that pivotal point @Channel7? #AusOpen #fedfan
Ironic that the changing of the guard at the #AusOpen helps odds of a #Federer v #Nadal Final. #oldschool #fedfan
What a difference 24 hrs makes. Love that #Dasha brings her own texta for autographs! #AusOpen
Djoker in the fifth, Warner at the crease, Teletubbies on TV.... #AusOpen #AUSvPAK #parentproblems https://t.co/5hbUKaj0Vm
@daveray99 I saw a poll: who you would rather have playing for your life- Kyrgios or Steady Eddie. Kyrgios not polling well. #nuffsaid
Stop the cheer leading @Channel7. Win or lose, 'he's not the messiah, he's a very naughty boy.' #Ausopen #Kyrgios #RoleModel
If you hate your job that much, it's probably healthier to get a different one. #AusOpen #kyrgios #embarrassing
Looks like a great way to finish @MacDonald_Ali. Congrats on a great job in arguably the toughest gig in the game.… https://t.co/fVRRPhSZzW
Perfect night for the best reg season fixture of any code in Australia. No better theatre anywhere. Let's go… https://t.co/Uh9ipihFo6
How good to have @JoKonta91 back on court in Sydney and firing at the #apiainternational. Welcome back Johanna & go well in 2017.
'This is as big a point in tennis as you can get.' Ummm..... No, it isn't. #fast4tennis
Call me old but I'll take a 5 set Davis Cup match followed by a cricket test match and forget #fast4tennis & #T20 was ever invented. #yuck
To think folks paid to watch that? #Kyrgios #HopmanCup
'Renshaw was slow clapped in Adelaide by people who don't understand the game.' #truth Please don't ever leave us Bill. #wwos #AUSvPAK
How many 20yo openers have batted through the full first day of a test? #Warner and #Renshaw share the spoils today. #realopeners #AUSvPAK
Awesome @MattRenshaw449. Watched his mate create history & helped the team capitalise on it. Unbelievable maturity. #AUSvPAK #realopeners
@tpignata9 You guys might run eq favourites Tony? Time to get cracking on the remainder of the tickets. There's some good ones still there.
@BaysideNSW 9pm fireworks 3 mins longer than #SydneyNYE & still going. We're over serviced down south. #happynewyear
Cmon Jackson roll thru the over and let's get the #GOAT back on. #AUSvPAK #niiiicegary
Poor Nick Maddinson will end up with an opportunity to display his selflessness again today. Hopefully fortune favours the brave. #AUSvPAK

@hughcavill Bill playing role of exec producer too. Evidently he thinks the odd chat about what's happening is relevant. #legend
'Let's stay with the cricket.' Words to live by from the Captain of the Commentary team. Thanks Bill. #wwos #AUSvPAK
'You look for your dreams in heaven but what the hell are you supposed to do when they come true?' #RIPGeorge #waiting #farck2016
Strong stuff from @wwos - only one man can open on Boxing Day at the MCG. #morningbill #AUSvPAK #boxingdaytest
@mogulmatt happy birthday Princess Dusty! & all the best to the Bakers.

Received a copy of this today. You couldn't find a better way for a @Arsenal_NSW or @AussieArsenal supporter to prep for #arsenalinsydney

@zalman44 has anyone taken the marsh lads yet?
Has a young Aussie bat looked more like a test player from day one since Ponting? #AUSvPAK #handscomb
Congrats @CricketAus & @tensporttv on the #WBBL02 coverage. Great respect for the game and fantastic intro to cricket for my 7yo daughter.
Full credit to Foxsports for presenting that like it was a sporting event. #NRLFightNight
Outstanding 'charge' call, solid tantrum & the curse is almost broken. Let's go @illawarrahawks! #NBL17 #hawkheads
@simonjzw have you spent a Sunday night in Adelaide
Great to hear #symbio baby monkey is back with mum. Trust the enquiries police are making re dad and sis are suitably vigorous @Channel7
Got to feel for South Africa- win the series in oz and their end of series party falls in Adelaide on a Sunday. #ausvsa #blowout
Great knock again from @stevesmith49. You'd love to see these captains lead their countries at this level for many future series. #AUSvSA
The Aussies haven't been this dominated by a vilified, opposition captain since.... the last time Kohli was in town. #AusVSa #Duplessis
Why is a guy whose 'mum' gave him a 'diet pill' counselling Du Plessis about taking responsibility for actions? #ausvsa #wwos
Wow! That's an opening 30 years in the making. Happy anniversary, #ARIAS 🍾
@SpursOfficial you only need five letters: 'HARRY'
Hello #Adele. In the round. In @ANZStadium. 10 March, 2017. https://t.co/sYPL3nub9f
@Ben_Hawes that came up next Ben. Kids proudly owning a Messi and Ronaldo jersey-is this the generation where the player is a bigger brand?
Using the #ArsenalinSydney tour for @Arsenal fan engagement purposes gets a run in the Fan v Customer panel. Nice job Will! #moneyinsport
@daveharrisAUS good point Dave. Particularly after you consider the @seancallanan preso this morning!
Defining fan loyalty: 'If you're a football fan in U.K, you're more likely to change spouse than your team.' #moneyinsport #holygrail
Ironic that @wwos cricket highlights pack was followed by the highlight of the current summer- covers on at Bellerive. #AusvSA #betterdays

@Lisa_Wilkinson 350 million to one, evidently https://t.co/iAS8sbRSpQ

Thx @popovic_daniel for guiding us choppers around in the @NSWOpen Pro Am today. You're a very patient man! All the best for a big summer!

If you're looking for a miracle this week, head immediately to #Chicago. Irish eyes are justifiably smiling tonight! #NZLvIRE
The Aussies must be sick of getting stuck bowling on roads that change into brutes when their middle order arrives. #ausvsa #longsummerahead
@Ben_Hawes Wish I had enough to go all in on anything!
If I was a sports #journalism student, I'd hope that some time in my life I'd write an article half this good.… https://t.co/nmtB1rj99u
Who knew bowling at the stumps would upend a tail ender? #ausvsa
One of the great race wins anywhere, anytime. Fantastic sport. Far too good. #VRCOaks #springcarnival

Bruce, you are the best. #MelbourneCup #channel7

@Julian_OBrien I was shore you couldn't keep this up for the whole game.
@wollongong_nsw you nailed it! The world literally awaits. #cruisewollongong https://t.co/HrxYpdjbtk
The start of something very special in @wollongong_nsw. V proud of you Brother Mark. Now for Disneyland!… https://t.co/IDsaxD2AH7
How good are knockout results in the last few on #DerbyDay? Not good at all if you're nowhere near them. Onwards to the get out stakes.....
James the 4th generation in the family to win a Derby. Meanwhile, the Sleighs still trying for a Kembla Maiden. #derbyday #cummings #legend
Fair play to the winner- not bad to win the Derby by 4 running sideways. #derbyday #prizedicon
You won't see a better hands & heels ride than this today.....#derbyday https://t.co/xpZ8ydKs2l
Historic weekend for our 'Steel City'. Congrats to all involved. Long may it continue. #radianceoftheseas… https://t.co/p7SZssIkOC
Full credit to #nick for waiting to the last minute of a 55 day broadcast to be speechless. #SurvivorAU
@Lou_Sticca Ruby: 'what's that river Dad?' 'It's the equivalent of our harbour baby.' R- 'Can we go home now?' Good to see you this am mate
@SydneyEditor Prev. Sydney visitors/ champions: Man U 2013 ✅Juve 2014 ✅ Chelsea 2015 ✅. It's not too late to get on board @Arsenal, Peter!
Great to launch #arsenalinsydney campaign with @dailytelegraph today. I'm a little biased but loving @Arsenal… https://t.co/bFvWd4FVkj
@MrBlairHughes 13 ish week suspension of which 8 weeks don't have tour events. That'll learn him
@zalman44 # of weeks left on tour this year? 3. Clayton's suspension. He'll be pissing himself
@crosscourt1 by my count there are only 3 tour weeks left. Looks like the suspension you give when you don't want to give a suspension.
@MrBlairHughes interesting to see what @TennisAustralia do- they've put him in 2 of their summer exos. How could they possibly put him up?
@MrBlairHughes I disagree Blair- I can't think of a sportsperson less worthy of time or $. Win or lose, not sure he's got GP support
Based on today's #PurposeTour sales in Australia, its fair to say, I'm now a #Belieber #frontiertouring #anzstadium
Remember, it's a team game, @Socceroos. Everyone kick it to @Tim_Cahill. #AUSvJPN #GoSocceroos
